You just created a new Stick application. Here are some possible next steps:

  • Tweak the URL routing or middleware stack in main.js.
  • Edit and add actions in actions.js.
  • Adapt the mustache templates in the templates directory to your liking.
  • Install one of the available database packages to store application data.
  • Visit our tutorial or documentation to learn more about Ringo.

Thank you for using Stick!
